name: Castlevania: Circle of the Realm
storyline:
Set's 7 years after Dracula's defeat on the event of Castlevania - Circle of The Moon (GBA 1999 - 2001)
Out of no where, a castle emerged once again. Play as Nathan Graves and Hugh Baldwin, storm the
demonic castle, collect powerups, and let the adventure begin!
summary: Is a simple yet complex mod/ROM Hack for Castlevania - Portrait of Ruin. Takes 7 years after the event of Castlevania - Circle of The Moon and as a Fan prequel to Castlevania 64. Arm yourself, storm into the deep dark castle, and be ready to send the dark legend back to its realm.
